verses.verse: O <S%H430>God<s%>, you have cast us <S%H2186>off<s%>, you have <S%H6555>scattered<s%> <S%H599>us<s%>, you have been displeased; O turn yourself to us <S%H7725>again<s%>.
You have made the <S%H776>earth<s%> to <S%H7493>tremble<s%>; you have <S%H6480>broken<s%> <S%H7495>it<s%>: heal the <S%H7667>breaches<s%> <S%H4131>there<s%>; for it shakes.
You have <S%H7200>showed<s%> your <S%H5971>people<s%> hard <S%H7186>things<s%>: you have made us to <S%H8248>drink<s%> the <S%H3196>wine<s%> of <S%H8653>astonishment<s%>.
You have <S%H5414>given<s%> a <S%H5251>banner<s%> to them that <S%H3373>fear<s%> <S%H5127>you<s%>, that it may be displayed <S%H6440>because<s%> of the <S%H7189>truth<s%>. <S%H5542>Selah<s%>.
That your <S%H3039>beloved<s%> may be <S%H2502>delivered<s%>; <S%H3467>save<s%> with your right <S%H3225>hand<s%>, and hear <S%H6030>me<s%>.

<S%H430>God<s%> has <S%H1696>spoken<s%> in his <S%H6944>holiness<s%>; I will <S%H5937>rejoice<s%>, I will <S%H2505>divide<s%> <S%H7927>Shechem<s%>, and measure <S%H4058>out<s%> the <S%H6010>valley<s%> of <S%H5523>Succoth<s%>.
<S%H1568>Gilead<s%> is <S%H4519>mine<s%>, and Manasseh is <S%H669>mine<s%>; Ephraim also is the <S%H4581>strength<s%> of my <S%H7218>head<s%>; <S%H3063>Judah<s%> is my <S%H2710>lawgiver<s%>;
<S%H4124>Moab<s%> is my <S%H5518>washpot<s%>; over <S%H123>Edom<s%> will I cast <S%H7993>out<s%> my <S%H5275>shoe<s%>: <S%H6429>Philistia<s%>, triumph you because of <S%H7321>me<s%>.
Who will <S%H2986>bring<s%> me into the <S%H4692>strong<s%> <S%H5892>city<s%>? who will <S%H5148>lead<s%> me into <S%H123>Edom<s%>?
Will not <S%H430>you<s%>, O God, which had cast us <S%H2186>off<s%>? and <S%H430>you<s%>, O God, which did not go <S%H3318>out<s%> with our <S%H6635>armies<s%>?
<S%H3051>Give<s%> us <S%H5833>help<s%> from <S%H6862>trouble<s%>: for <S%H7723>vain<s%> is the <S%H8668>help<s%> of <S%H120>man<s%>.
Through <S%H430>God<s%> we shall <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H2428>valiantly<s%>: for he it is that shall tread <S%H947>down<s%> our <S%H6862>enemies<s%>.
